full_sentence: In lord of the rings i've taken to interpreting the ring as a metaphor for the danger that lurks in all of us. Man is enthralled by the world and the circuses of modern "advancement". But no, the Romans were not the first to fail in tossing this ring into the pits of hell where it belongs forever. Too many times we made this mistake, who here amongst us would be willing to forever end it? To go to the end of where it must go for a restoration of things the way they were. This can has been kicked for long enough now. We are holding out for 2024. An operation which may fail to deliver results but we must take matters into our own very capable hands.
